title: Interface Sounds - Sci-Fi Computer Beeps, Buttons, HUD & UI Sound Effects
description: 1000 high quality, futuristic interface and sci-fi computer HUD & UI sound effects, including neutral interface sounds, confirms, denials, data processing, hi-tech hologram sounds, 8-bit retro sounds, glitch sound FX, and typing sound effects!
longDescription:
Youtube Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bNy5Bs0Rp2g


With Binary Code 2 sound library Sound Response brings you its biggest and most diverse interface sound library yet, with a total of 1000 professionally designed, high quality, futuristic interface and sci-fi computer sound effects! 


Binary Code 2 is a diverse collection of HUD and UI sound effects separated in eight different categories, that features vast selection of neutral interface hi-tech beeps, bleeps, clicks and button sci-fi sound effects, confirmed (access granted) and negative (access denied) UI sounds, subtle sweeps and smooth futuristic hi-tech hologram sound effects, data processing and readouts, various glitch sound effects, those chirpy 8-bit retro game sounds, and typing sci-fi sound effects. With this large and versatile interface sound effects collection at your disposal you’ll be able to create that sought-after, sophisticated, futuristic high tech sound for your next video game that you're working on!


If you like the sound of Binary Code 2 be sure to check out DATA sound library, The Future is Now sound library, and also the most massive and the most diverse interface sound library from Sound Response to this date – Binary Code 3 – Interface Multiverse that features 1300 (2.3GB) professionally designed brand new HUD & UI sound effects!


Binary Code 2 sound library contains 1000 sound effects separated into eight categories:


1.Neutral

2.Confirmed (Access Granted)

3.Denied (Access Denied)

4.Subtle (Holograms)

5.Data Processing

6.Typing

7.8-Bit Retro

8.Glitches


Binary Code 2 - Interface Sound Effects List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 1000

Number of Audio Cues: 1000

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Minutes of audio provided: 43.07 min
